verbs.description: [ARG0: sweep of yankees] [V: shows] [ARG1: red sox can do damage too a four - game sweep of the rival new york yankees gave the boston red sox a 9 1 2-game lead in the al east and put to rest any doubt about the quality of their major league - leading 79 - 34 record boston andrew benintendi boston red sox brian cashman new york yankees]

sweep of yankees shows red sox [V: can] do damage too a four - game sweep of the rival new york yankees gave the boston red sox a 9 1 2-game lead in the al east and put to rest any doubt about the quality of their major league - leading 79 - 34 record boston andrew benintendi boston red sox brian cashman new york yankees
